column1: 1. We have three key revenue streams treated differently: Group Classes/Private Classes/Private Studio Hire
2. *We deal with NET PRICES only*/ We calculate the splits after tax has been deducted. All taxes on this spreadsheet are at a rate of 7%.
3. Group Class Mantra: The revenue for each class we breakdown into 43.5% for the coach, 8.5% to the management team and 30% to BGM.
4. Private Class Mantra: The revenue for each session we breakdown into 80% for the coach, 15% to BGM.
5. Studio Hire Mantra: External contractors hire the studios so we pay 8.5% to the management team and 30% to BGM.

6. We have to calculate the price per class which is simple to calculate for Pay As You Go packs. For pay monthly packs, we operate on a model of an average of 4.3 weeks per month and divide by number of sessions delivered that month.
7. Exceptions: For any unlimited packages (which will be slowly phased out) we assume the revenue per class and pay fixed rates for all involved parties.

column3: The discounted price of a membership package OR if sold for free, the price it SHOULD have been purchased at.
